name: Welcome to the Hell (Taliyahaha)
description:
Hi everyone !

I'm learning video game development, here my second project made during my formation.

The game is actually simple but it's working.

I will update it later when i got time, at the end of my formation.

How to play :

Key : Up Down Left Right for mooving

Space for shoot

How to win : 

Destroy all ennemy waves for win the game, if the player have no life, he will die and lost the game.

Enjoy :)
